title: Create drop shipping management application

requirements.text: Create a product catalog system where users can browse and search products available for drop shipping, including product name, description, supplier information, wholesale price, and suggested retail price

quotes: Make an app about drop shipping

acceptanceCriteria: Users can view a list of available products
Each product displays name, description, supplier, wholesale price, and suggested retail price
Users can search products by name or description
Product data is stored persistently in the backend

requirements.text: Implement order management functionality allowing users to create, track, and manage customer orders with order status tracking (pending, processing, shipped, delivered)

quotes: Make an app about drop shipping

acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new orders with customer details and selected products
Orders display customer information, products, quantities, and total price
Order status can be updated through defined workflow stages
Users can view order history and filter by status

requirements.text: Build a supplier management interface to add, edit, and view supplier information including name, contact details, and associated products

quotes: Make an app about drop shipping

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add new suppliers with name, email, and contact information
Users can view a list of all suppliers
Users can edit supplier details
Each supplier shows associated products they provide

requirements.text: Create a dashboard displaying key metrics including total products, active orders, pending orders, and total revenue

quotes: Make an app about drop shipping

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays product count, order statistics, and revenue metrics
Metrics update in real-time based on current data
Dashboard provides an at-a-glance overview of business performance

requirements.text: Implement profit calculation showing the difference between wholesale and retail prices for each product and order

quotes: Make an app about drop shipping

acceptanceCriteria: Products display calculated profit margin
Orders show total profit based on wholesale vs retail pricing
Profit calculations are accurate and automatically computed

requirements.text: Design a modern, professional interface with a clean visual theme that conveys trust and efficiency for e-commerce business management, using a sophisticated color palette (avoid blue and purple) with clear typography and intuitive navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Interface uses a cohesive color scheme throughout the application
Typography is clear and professional
Layout facilitates easy navigation between products, orders, and suppliers
Design conveys professionalism suitable for business software

constraints: Use Motoko for backend implementation in a single actor
Use React with TypeScript for frontend
Do not modify Internet Identity integration hooks
nonGoals: Multi-user authentication with role-based access control

required: Modern e-commerce hero background with subtle geometric patterns in warm professional tones (hero-bg.dim_1200x600.png)
Simple package box icon for products section (package-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Delivery truck icon for orders section (truck-icon.dim_128x128.png)
